name: Lip Art 3D
description:
Lips are the perfect canvas to create the most imaginative art.
And Lip Art 3D turns you into an expert lip art makeup artist in no time!

Make those pouting lips pop with lipsticks, brushes, gloss, glitter, sequins and rhinestones.

Complete dozens of unique and gorgeous lip art designs and watch the “Likes” ticking like crazy!

This is easily the best and the most satisfying lip art game out there!
